name: DeathSpank: Thongs of Virtue
description: Deathspank and Deathspank: Thongs of Virtue are now available on the Mac!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7Processor: Intel Pentium 4 (or equivalent with SSE2 support) running at 1.7 GHz or greaterMemory: 1 GB of ram, 1.5 GB (Vista and Windows 7)Hard Disk Space: at least 2 GB of free HD spaceVideo Card: ATI Radeon X1900 GT 256MB and the Nvidia GeForce 6800 Ultra 256MB cards; Shader 2.0 and 24 bit depth buffer support requiredDirectX®: DirectX9 Jun 2010Local co-op requirements: A controller is required for the second player

reviews.review_text: I was happy to hear more DeathSpank would be coming. Thongs Of Virtue is basically more of the same, which is great. The new content includes new weapons (assault rifles, bazookas, etc.), enemies and of course many environments to explore, but the formula stays the same. It also has a great deal of fetch quests and grinding, which can be kind of tedious if you play longer sessions, but all things considered, Thongs Of Virtue is on par with its predecessor!  Personal playtime total: 20 hours

The Dispenser of Justice, Vanquisher of Evil, and Hero to the Downtrodden, DeathSpank, is back! This time our hero journeys on the quest for the Thongs of Virtue. The game embodies a variety of classic RPG elements, tons of loot, quests and the same humorous touch we got used to in the first episode. If you liked the first DeathSpank, you'll also enjoy this one.    +  Funny storyline   +  Funny take on protagonist   +  Classic RPG elements  +  Tons of loot, quests, and a multitude of equipment combos/sets  +  Easy Achievements  +  Local Co-op  -  No Trading Cards (Emotes/Backgrounds)     Personal Ranking:   8/10

Before I played DeathSpank: The First, I thought that this game would only be interesting because it literally has 'Thongs' in the title. But then I played DeathSpank, and I honestly can't wait to play this one.
Another fun adventure with DeathSpank, Dispenser of Justice, Vanquisher of Evil, and the Hero to the Downtrodden. The humor is just as great as the first game, but this is more than double as long.
Much Humor, Great Death.  An Hero/10 would Spank again
great little game easy to play and easy achievements.
It's an alright sequel, but I don't think they really did much of a difference apart from making the main characters voice a little bit more annoying. 7.8/10

LoL, moar DeathSpank! This guy is great. Love the dialog with its witty sarcastic humor. If you enjoyed the 1st you'll enjoy the 2nd. Also, you get to navigate a pirate ship! Too bad it's given to you at the end of the game. :'( Lastly, this game is a tad bit longer that the original so that was cool. All that's left is The Bacoing...
This game was a very casual game. I enjoyed it. I enjoyed the first one more. This was a good play however.
Great humor, nice graphic and fun to play
